price: Lalle ne ¡ãrũna ya kasance daga mutãnen Mũsã, sai ya fita* daga tsãrinsu alhãli Mun bã shi taskõkin abin da yake mabũɗansa sunã nauyi ga jama'a** ma'abũta ƙarfi a lõkacin da mutãnensa suka ce masa, "Kada ka yi annashuwa, lalle ne Allah bã Ya son mãsu annashuwa."
arabic: ۞ إِنَّ قَٰرُونَ كَانَ مِن قَوۡمِ مُوسَىٰ فَبَغَىٰ عَلَيۡهِمۡۖ وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ مِنَ ٱلۡكُنُوزِ مَآ إِنَّ مَفَاتِحَهُۥ لَتَنُوٓأُ بِٱلۡعُصۡبَةِ أُوْلِي ٱلۡقُوَّةِ إِذۡ قَالَ لَهُۥ قَوۡمُهُۥ لَا تَفۡرَحۡۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلۡفَرِحِينَ
footnotes: * Asalin baghy zãlunci, amma ga izɗilãhi, shi ne fita daga ɗã'ar shugaban Musulmi. ** Yawan su saba'in, an ce arba'in, kuma an ce gõma.

version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
